CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Express Couriers relative to Drone Delivery?
SRP.A: Express Couriers is {below} Drone Delivery in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Autonomous Vehicles}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total delivery time?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Express Couriers}.

VE.Q: What is Rural Logistics's Delivery Time in 1986?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time in 1986 is {0.42} days.

VE.Q: What is Rural Logistics's Delivery Time in 1990?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time in 1990 is {0.17} days.

VE.Q: What is International Freight's Delivery Time in 1982?
VE.A: International Freight's delivery time in 1982 is {0.93} days.

VE.Q: What are the delivery time of Rural Logistics, Drone Delivery, and Express Couriers in 1995?
VE.A: Rural Logistics's delivery time is {0.15} days, Drone Delivery's delivery time is {2.53} days, Express Couriers's delivery time is {0.03} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum delivery time is {0.03} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Delivery Time in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum delivery time is {3.23} days.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles reached approximately {3.20} days in {1991}.

EVJ.Q: What is the lowest Delivery Time level recorded for Autonomous Vehicles?
EVJ.A: Autonomous Vehicles's lowest recorded level is approximately {1.89} days in {1979}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Delivery Time?
SC.A: The average total delivery time is {7.60} days.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Delivery Time fall between 7.24 and 8.00 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time go below 6.09 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Delivery Time exceed 9.15 days? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1974 and 1984, did the total Delivery Time experience a larger or smaller change than between 1970 and 1980?
NC.A: The change in total delivery time between 1974 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1970 and 1980.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 1994 higher or lower than in 1996?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 1994 was {lower} than in 1996.

NC.Q: Between 1970 and 1977, was the average total Delivery Time higher or lower than between 1981 and 1988?
NC.A: The average total delivery time between 1970 and 1977 was {higher} than between 1981 and 1988.

NC.Q: Was the total Delivery Time in 1983 higher or lower than in 1985?
NC.A: The total delivery time in 1983 was {higher} than in 1985.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Autonomous Vehicles} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {International Freight, Express Couriers, Rural Logistics, Autonomous Vehicles, Drone Delivery}.
